attributes.action: Regulate airport car park tariffs and rules on dropping off passengers.
attributes.background: Recently there has been a change in airport car park tariffs and rules around dropping passengers off. People are receiving fines for dropping people off outside the airports car park because they do not enter the car park. If using the car park they are subject to high prices for staying there.

rejection.details: The price of airport car parking, is a decision for the airport and not the UK Government and Parliament.
